title: Smithenns

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: I can see that this is all about a trading platform, i will recommend that if you're interested in taking it to that next level as you planned and wish to see people trust your services, then go through the normal procedures and make a good reputation here, try to buy a copper membership, create a ANN Thread discussion, and present what you do through your platform accurately, if you're really sure of being responsible for this organization or trading platforms you're introducing, your thread could as well be moved to service discussion board.
